Description.Name: MRB Console: Omega Authorization
Description.Details:
<color=#0033FF>Unlocked through Event.</color>

MRB Console upgrade required to take on Omega classified contracts, enabling access to difficult superheavy contracts. These type contracts are much harder and allows total drop tonnage of up to 1225 tons depending on contract difficulty.

AssignedCastDescription: Omega contracts... Those are where the true beauties are, Boss. 'Mechs so large that you can not understand it until you see one.
